ðŸ“– Summary: Onlook is an open-source, visual-first code editor designed for building websites, prototypes, and designs with AI in Next.js and Tailwind CSS. It allows users to make edits directly in the browser DOM with a visual editor, offering a design-in-realtime experience with code and serving as an open-source alternative to tools like Bolt.new and Webflow.
